originalText.text: Doctor Danna Zappetti was wonderful, professional, explained the purpose of each test along with a clear actual computer image of my lungs and what was represented.  I would highly recommend her. She was like talking to my sister.

text.text: Doctor Danna Zappetti was wonderful, professional, explained the purpose of each test along with a clear actual computer image of my lungs and what was represented.  I would highly recommend her. She was like talking to my sister.

originalText.text: Wonderful, wonderful Dr. Zappetti.  She is brilliant, caring, great bedside manner.  I trust her completely and am so happy I found her and she is my Pulmonologist.  She’s always there for me with her care and concern, and I feel so comfortable with her.

text.text: Wonderful, wonderful Dr. Zappetti.  She is brilliant, caring, great bedside manner.  I trust her completely and am so happy I found her and she is my Pulmonologist.  She’s always there for me with her care and concern, and I feel so comfortable with her.

originalText.text: Absolutely phenomenal. I saw Dr.Zappetti to get a second opinion. I wanted a second opinion since the first pulmonologist I had seen was very dismissive and brief and concluded my diagnosis without looking at my medical records or even examining me. Dr. Zappetti was the complete opposite. Just from her subjective questioning of me, my background, family history, work, environmental exposures, past test, current symptoms, ages/eases, all of it. She was so thorough. And she looked at every last piece of test I had brought in for her. And not just ‘glance’ , she really collected all the evidence she could. Then she examined me. And she could have ordered repeat test and billed me (honestly I would have done anything she suggested), but she didn’t because it was not necessary. After our appointment, I feel seen, heard, and confident in her opinion. She’s a gem and doctors like her are hard to find.

text.text: Absolutely phenomenal. I saw Dr.Zappetti to get a second opinion. She was so thorough. And she looked at every last piece of test I had brought in for her. And not just ‘glance’ , she really collected all the evidence she could. Then she examined me. And she could have ordered repeat test and billed me (honestly I would have done anything she suggested), but she didn’t because it was not necessary. After our appointment, I feel seen, heard, and confident in her opinion. She’s a gem and doctors like her are hard to find.

originalText.text: Dr. Dana Zapetti is an exceptionally fine doctor.  Her manner is upbeat and kind and she is thorough and understands my medical issues perfectly.  I trust her knowledge and professional judgement without reservation.

text.text: Dr. Dana Zapetti is an exceptionally fine doctor.  Her manner is upbeat and kind and she is thorough and understands my medical issues perfectly.  I trust her knowledge and professional judgement without reservation.

originalText.text: Dr. Zappetti's bedtime manner is extraordinarily comforting, and I would like all to know that she is very polite, easygoing, and professional. I thank Dr. Madeline Sterling for recommending her. Great doctors deserve a good review! Keep the industry honest and open to eager patients. Update 2.2.24,  my husband and Mom loved her and her medical staff. The phlebotomist has wonderful talent in drawing blood. You don't feel her prick. It's always a delight to visit Dr. Zappetti.
